en.description:
Release Date: May 30th, 2017

Oberon Prime is the primed variant of the Oberon Warframe featuring more powerful stats: 25 extra energy and 75 extra armor, as well as two additional polarities, and a new particle effect on his Reckoning ability and his Hallowed Ground ability.
en.codex: Oberon Prime unleashes dogmatic retribution upon enemies, and supports allies with divine benevolence in equal measure. Featuring altered mod polarities for greater customization.

ru.description: Оберон Прайм — паладин среди Варфреймов. Он сбалансированный боец, в равенстве наделен как наступательными так и защитными навыками.
